thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jez C
title: Great location
text:
This is a decent hotel in a fantastic location
Literally right across the road from Grand Central Station, Times Square ten minutes you really couldn't want for a better place to stay
The staff are helpful and the rooms cleaned to a decent standard every day
Each room has a safe, if you booked and it stared free wifi make sure you speak to reception otherwise you'll pay for this
Nice bar and pool room, some of the bedrooms are in need of a little tlc, all in all a enjoyable stay in a decent place
